//if empty, false;\n        int countE = 0;\n        int posE = 0; //last posE.\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++) {\n            if(s[i] == 'e') {\n                countE++;\n                posE = i;\n            }\n        }\n        if(countE > 1)\n            return false;\n        //we have max one E\n        if(countE == 0) \n            return isOK(s, 1); //1: decimal ok?\n        //we have 1 E\n        //first part decimal, second part integer. \n        return isOK(s.substr(0, posE), 1) && isOK(s.substr(posE+1), 0);\n    }\n\n    bool isOK(string s, int k ) { //K: 1: decimal; 0: integer.\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++) {\n            if( ( s[i]=='+' || s[i] == '-') && i != 0 ) //non leading sign. \n                return false;\n        }\n        if( ( s[0]=='+' || s[0] == '-') ) //erase leading sign. \n                s.erase(s.begin());\n        int countDot = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<s.size(); i++) {\n            if(s[i]=='.')\n                countDot++;\n            else if( !isdigit(s[i]) )\n                return false;\n        }\n        if(k==1)\n            return countDot<=1;\n        else \n            return countDot==0;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
